questions.question_text: The newer Macintosh Operating System is based on:

discussion.content: A quick google search of, "Mac OS X is based on BSD UNIX" will confirm this is correct.
haha this is talked about almost directly from the Pearson IT book on Digital Forensics

questions.question_text: In General, __________________ Involves the investigation of data that can be retrieved from the hard disk or other disks of a computer by applying scientific methods to retrieve the data.
When a file is deleted by Windows Explorer or through the MS-DOS delete command, the operating system inserts _______________ in the first letter position of the filename in the FAT database.

discussion.content: E5h is decimal 229. Alt 229 ASCII code is, greek lowercase sigma, so answer is damm correct. WTH, friends :D
Hex byte code E5h is correct ans.

questions.question_text: When examining a hard disk without a write-blocker, you should not start windows because Windows will write data to the:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
It should be a case file. We use the write-blocker to avoid the contamination of the case file

comments.content: I think that would be one of the first points of call for evidence - deleted data that has not been emptied from the Recycle bin yet.

discussion.content: Anyone has a justification for this?

choices.B: prove that the tools you used to conduct your examination are perfect
choices.C: read your curriculum vitae to the jury
choices.D: qualify you as an expert witness

questions.question_text: Before you are called to testify as an expert, what must an attorney do first?
